summary: Web app for ANC Electronics N More / ANC Marketplace with required legal policies, consent/signature flows, and updated footer compliance/contact/payment branding. Domain: https://anc-electronics-n-services-rw8.caffeine.com
architectural_notes: Legal/policy links must be present in the global footer on every page
Policies require acceptance + digital signature by both customers and sellers
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Payment card brand logos strip in a clean monochrome style (payment-logos-strip.dim_800x120.png)
- Authorize.net logo in monochrome (authorize-net-logo.dim_240x80.png)
- Zen dash logo in monochrome (zen-dash-logo.dim_240x80.png)

existing_features.title: Add site-wide footer content on every page (via the shared layout) that includes: (a) copyright notice "© ANC Electronics N More"; (b) "PCI Compliant # 201100278838"; (c) the provided business/contact information exactly as written; (d) a "Partners" line mentioning "Authorize.net" and "Zen dash"; and (e) major credit/debit card brand logos (Visa, Mastercard, and other major brands) displayed in the footer.
Create new legal policy pages for Shipping Policy, Returns Policy, and Terms & Conditions, and make them accessible from the footer on every page.

Update the existing Privacy Policy page content to use the privacy policy text the user uploads (replace the current placeholder policy content), while keeping the route/path to the privacy policy page stable.

Ensure a cookie permission pop-up is present and functional: allow users to Accept or Reject cookies, persist their choice locally, and provide a clear link to view the Privacy Policy from the banner.

Implement a digital policy acceptance + signature flow that applies to both customers and sellers: users must (1) explicitly accept and (2) digitally sign each of the following policies: Privacy Policy, Shipping Policy, Returns Policy, Terms & Conditions. Store per-user acceptance records including policy identifier, policy version/last-updated value, signature name/text, and timestamp.

Enforce policy signing: when an authenticated user has not signed all required policies, block access to actions that imply usage of the marketplace (at minimum: purchasing/checkout flows and seller/business tools) until all required policies are signed, and provide a clear navigation path to complete signing.

Add the new policy routes (Shipping, Returns, Terms) to the app router and include them in both desktop and mobile navigation only where appropriate (footer links are required; header nav can remain unchanged unless necessary).
